alert.note: Alert for Christian; Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 11:09PM EDT until March 25 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Christian County in south central Kentucky... Todd County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1009 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Crofton to near Hopkinsville to near Fort Campbell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Oak Grove and Pembroke around 1020 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Elkton and Guthrie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 77 and 92. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
